description:
DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup aiming for artificial general intelligence (AGI), announced plans to open-source five repositories starting next week as part of its commitment to transparency and community-driven innovation. However, this development comes against the backdrop of mounting controversies that have drawn parallels to the TikTok saga. Today, DeepSeek shared its intentions in a […]

The post DeepSeek to open-source AGI research amid privacy concerns appeared first on AI News.
title: DeepSeek to open-source AGI research amid privacy concerns
